app.core package

Submodules

app.core.system module

class app.core.system.ArtifactRegistry(database: Database, storage: Storage)[source]

Bases: object

Manages artifact registration, retrieval, listing, and deletion by interacting with a database and storage system.

delete(artifact_id: str) → None[source]

Delete an artifact by its ID.

Args:

artifact_id (str): The ID of the artifact to delete.

Raises:

ValueError: If the artifact cannot be found or deleted.

get(artifact_id: str) → Artifact[source]

Retrieve an artifact by its ID.

Args:

artifact_id (str): The ID of the artifact to retrieve.

Returns:

Artifact: The retrieved Artifact object.

list(type: str = None) → List[Artifact][source]

List all artifacts, optionally filtering by type.

Args:

type (str, optional): Filter for artifact type.

Returns:

List[Artifact]: A list of Artifact objects.

register(artifact: Artifact) → None[source]

Register an artifact by saving its data and metadata.

Args:

artifact (Artifact): The artifact to be registered.

class app.core.system.AutoMLSystem(storage: LocalStorage, database: Database)[source]

Bases: object

A singleton class for managing an AutoML system with storage, database, and artifact registry.

Get the singleton instance of the AutoMLSystem.

Returns:

AutoMLSystem: The singleton instance.

property registry: ArtifactRegistry

Access the artifact registry.

Returns:

ArtifactRegistry: The artifact registry.
